alert.note: Alert for Clayton; Coweta; Fayette; Henry; Lamar; Meriwether; Pike; Spalding (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 09 at 10:30PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Spalding, southern Fayette, northeastern Meriwether, northern Pike, southwestern Henry, southeastern Coweta, southern Clayton and northwestern Lamar Counties through 1100 PM EDT... At 1030 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Digbey, or 11 miles northwest of Zebulon, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...40 mph wind and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Griffin, Peachtree City, Hampton, Locust Grove, Senoia, Brooks, Williamson, Orchard Hill, Haralson, Woolsey, Sunny Side, East Griffin, Starrs Mill, Walker Mill, Hollonville, Rover, Luella, Highland Mills, Towalaga and Experiment. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.

area.areaDesc: Clayton; Coweta; Fayette; Henry; Lamar; Meriwether; Pike; Spalding
